sub_categories: Education and training grants, fellowship, stipend
brief_description: The scheme "Skill Development" by the Wadia Institute of Himalayan Geology, aims to impart practical training to postgraduate students in various Earth Science disciplines, including structural and evolutionary geology, geochemistry, geomorphology, glaciology, magnetostratigraphy, etc.
detailed_description: The scheme "Skill Development" implemented by the Wadia Institute of Himalayan Geology aims to enhance the practical knowledge and research capabilities of students pursuing Earth Science and allied subjects. Through this scheme, specialised summer and winter training programmes are offered to postgraduate and integrated postgraduate students in disciplines such as geochemistry, sedimentology, tectonics, geomorphology, environmental geoscience, and paleontology.
benefits: Research Experience: Provides opportunities for self-sponsored research work, allowing students to gain practical experience in Earth Sciences. Seasonal Training: Offers valuable summer and winter training programs, enhancing practical skills and knowledge in specialized geological disciplines. Exposure to Diverse Fields: Exposes students to a wide array of sub-disciplines within Earth Sciences, such as structural geology, geochemistry, glaciology, engineering geology, palaeontology, and environmental geology.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must possess a postgraduate degree in any discipline of Geosciences, Earth Sciences, or allied fields. The applicant may also be pursuing an integrated postgraduate degree course and should be in the fourth or fifth year of the curriculum. The applicant must be from fields such as geophysics, geochemistry, structural geology, sedimentology, paleontology, environmental geoscience, and related disciplines.

steps: Step 1: Visit the official website of WIHG at https://www.wihg.res.in./ . Step 2: Look for announcements or notifications regarding the Kaushal Vikas (Skill Development) programme. Step 3: Download or access the application form or online registration link. Step 4: Fill out the form with all required personal, academic, and institutional details. Step 5: Upload or attach the required documents as specified in the guidelines. Step 6: Submit the application as per instructions.

documents_required: Postgraduate Degree Certificate or Provisional Certificate. Bonafide Certificate from the Institution (for currently enrolled students). Academic Marksheet. Identity Proof (Aadhaar Card/Passport/Voter ID). Any other document s required.
